text: “You must not commit adultery, you must not kill, you must not steal, you must not jealously want things for yourself”13:9. Literally, “covet.” The quotation is from Exodus 20:13-17 or Deuteronomy 5:17-21.—these and the other commandments are summed up in the statement, “Love your neighbor as yourself.”13:9. Quoting Leviticus 19:18.
